name: Commando Combat Attack 2017
description:
Commando Combat Attack 2017 is a frontline adventure shooting game at best mountain command, there is one army Sniper, this Commando Combat Attack is full trained sniper shooter and you will shooting all enemies and then collect all guns and snipers. your enemies are much more you will expect a great clash at each checkpoint, so show your strength to kill enemy command, commando and advance step by step and reach the center point. In this Commando Combat Attack game, you will be faced with an increasingly large number of projectiles and enemies you are last frontline mountain commando and you have a best command sniper shooting on the mountain top shooter is the last hope for whole army. This Commando Combat Attack game is quite challenging and shooting game. In this Commando Combat Attack game you all alone with sniper would fight against these militants. You are highly trained sniper shooter assassin and you can do this all alone, so take your sniper gun and start eliminating these militants from your area.
Your call duty is to perform a secret operation, destroy their camps and kill your prey with your machine. It’s not a war of small weapons but it is fully modern and latest explosive weapons. Terrorists are equipped with the weapon of modern era and will be ready to crush you in this warfare. They are roaming around the city and surveillance of their strong hold.You will be metal awarded for your success in the battlefield if you destroy enemy forces. With these modern metal awards you may buy guns, Your enemy is also fighting and firing accurately.
Commando Combat Attack 2017 Features:
Realistic Mountain 3D environment
Smooth controls
Awesome weapons to perchase
Many free weapons
Realistic sound effects
Easy to play
